H0.text: Who did Friedrich Engels famously work with. Mikhail Bakunin

H1.text: Who did Friedrich Engels famously work with. Charles Darwin

H2.text: Who did Friedrich Engels famously work with. Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

H3.text: Who did Friedrich Engels famously work with. Marx

A4.text: The Communist Manifesto (written with Friedrich Engels)

A5.text: In collaboration with Engels, Marx also set about writing a book which is often seen as his best treatment of the concept of historical materialism, The German Ideology
